page.title: 18CLUBS IN THE MEOPHAM AREA
page.content:
There are no clubs in Sole Street and Luddesdown.Children and adults have to travel to Meopham or Gravesend.In Meopham there are many clubs which meet in the village hall.
Children's Clubs and Societies. Girl Guides, Youth Club, Brownies, Dancing Classes, Cub Scouts, Scouts, St. John's Ambulance Cadets.
Adult Clubs and Societies. Tennis, Luncheon Club, Women's Institute, Flower Arranging, Sports, Keep Fit, Dancing, Scottish Dancing,Table Tennis, Over 6O's Club and Mothers and Toddlers.
